name: Press Play On Tape
description:
An old fashioned latest craze videogame by Toonguska Games.

Use arrows to move

Use space to shoot.

Destroy all enemies and reach the end in 100 seconds.

Have fun!

Developed for Rainbow Game Jam 2017.

Game by Manuel Cañamero

Music by: RoleMusic (http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Rolemusic/)
